---
title: "General Psychology Schedule Winter 2023"
author: "Brian Holt"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: 
  html_document:
   anchor_sections: TRUE
   css: style.css
   toc: true
   toc_float: true
   toc_depth: 6
   number_sections: no    # if true, section labels render
   config:
      toc:
        scroll_highlight: yes
        before: |
          <li><a href="./">General Psychology Spring 2023 schedule</a></li>`
        after: |
          <li><a href="https://github.com/rstudio/bookdown" target="blank">Published with bookdown</a></li>
      toolbar:
        position: fixed
  #  download: [ "epub"]  #Not sure how to set up for epub yet
      search: yes
bibliography: [General_references.bib]
biblio-style: apalike
link-citations: yes

description: "This is a minimal example of using the rmarkdown package for general psychology"
---
